about_the_game:
BoneTown: The Second Coming Edition - Cheats, gives you access to all the cheat codes that make BoneTown an easier place to navigate and conquer.

The cheat code icon is different colored Spades wearing a Mask. If you have the DLC, they will appear in the world and on the mini-map like Chapters, Competitions, Save Points, and all the other bouncing icons in the world in Missionary Beach, The Homeland Trailerpark, Gabacho Heights, Nobbing Hill and Downtown.

The cheat codes available are below:


  • Swinging Beef: Ball size 10 and full Balls.
  • Vegas Baby: Get $99,999.
  • Sweet Moves: Unlocks all the Powermoves.
  • Good Times: Gives you 99 of each drug.
  • God Like: You become invincible.
  • Sexy Times: Unlock all sex positions.
  • I Can Do This All Night: Your sexual Stamina is infinite.

TO CLARIFY, THE CHEAT CODE DLC CREATES SPOTS (SPADES WEARING A MASK) IN THE WORLD WHERE YOU YOU GO TO ACTIVATE THE CHEATS.

THE CHEAT CODE DLC DOES NOT ALLOW YOU TO OPEN THE CONSOLE IN THE GAME.

USING THE CHEAT CODE DLC WILL DEACTIVATE THE ACHEIVEMENTS.

content_descriptors.notes:
In BoneTown, the player can try to get a blow job, have sex, or have anal sex with any girl in the game. The sex scenes are not blurred or censored with all of the sex acts visible to the player.

Most of the storylines in the game revolve around sexual interactions with other characters.

BoneTown uses satire as humor and depicts many different cultures in satirical ways. This humor could be found offensive to culturally sensitive people.

Drugs are used in BoneTown in place of magic, and anyone who finds the use of drugs offensive should not play this game.

name: BoneTown: The Second Coming Edition - Cheats

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2.8 GHz or AMD Athlon 2800+
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card supporting Pixel Shader 2.0
  • DirectX: Version 7.0
  • Storage: 5 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo 2.4 GHz or Althon X2 2.7 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI or Nvidia graphics card with 1GB video ram or better and Shader Model 3.0+ support (Nvidia GeForce GTX 560+ or ATI Radeon 6950+)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 6 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

short_description: Gain access to all the cheat codes that make BoneTown an easier place to navigate and conquer.
